sources.name: IPDS_Movies
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~>  IPDS_Movies

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared IPDS_Movies = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://myblobsa.blob.core.windows.net/input/Movies.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = IPDS_Movies,
  #"Filtered rows" = Table.SelectRows(Source, each [genres] <> "Thriller"),
  #"Split column by delimiter" = Table.SplitColumn(#"Filtered rows", "title", Splitter.SplitTextByDelimiter("("), {"title.1", "title.2"}),
  #"Extracted text before delimiter" = Table.TransformColumns(#"Split column by delimiter", {{"title.2", each Text.BeforeDelimiter(_, ")", 0), type text}}),
  #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Extracted text before delimiter", {{"title.2", Int64.Type}}),
  #"Changed column type 1" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Changed column type", {{"title.2", type text}}),
  #"Replaced errors" = Table.ReplaceErrorValues(#"Changed column type 1", {{"title.2", "0"}}),
  #"Filtered rows 1" = Table.SelectRows(#"Replaced errors", each [title.2] <> "0" and [title.2] <> null and [title.2] <> ""),
  #"Grouped rows" = Table.Group(#"Filtered rows 1", {"title.2", "genres"}, {{"MCount/Year", each Table.RowCount(_), Int64.Type}}),
  #"Sorted rows" = Table.Sort(#"Grouped rows", {{"title.2", Order.Ascending}})
in
  #"Sorted rows";
